column1: | Freight trains of more than 50 SLUs brought to a stand at Signal NL1294 on Channelsea Curve will be foul of    |                           |        |
| Stratford Central Junction in rear and junction margins should be applied at Stratford based on departure time |                           |        |
| For ARS regulating purposes in the Westbound direction ARR and DEP times with activities A and * to be used at |                           |        |
| Depart from Platform 1                                                                                         | Arrive in Platform 1 or 2 | 3      |
| Depart from Platform 2                                                                                         | Arrive in Platform 2      | 2      |
| Arrive in Platform 2                                                                                           | Depart from Platform 1    | 1      |
| EA1340 STRATFORD LEA JUNCTION TO HIGH MEADS JUNCTION                                                           |                           |        |
| For ARS regulating purposes in the Westbound direction ARR and DEP times with activities A and * to be used    |                           |        |
| EA1350 CHANNELSEA NORTH JUNCTION TO TEMPLE MILLS EAST JUNCTION                                                 |                           |        |
| For ARS regulating purposes in the Up direction towards Lea Junction or Channelsea Junction, ARR and DEP       |                           |        |
| times with activities A and * to be used and not pathing time.                                                 |                           |        |
| For ARS regulating purposes in the Northbound (Temple Mills Loop/Orient Way/Coppermill Junction) direction,    |                           |        |
| ARR and DEP times with activities A and * to be used and not pathing time.                                     |                           |        |
| EA1360 DUDDING HILL JUNCTION TO ACTON WELLS JUNCTION                                                           |                           |        |
| Note that Route MD 715 Neasden South Junction to Neasden Junction is closed when Neasden Junction Signal       |                           |        |
| Box is switched out.  See Section 2.2 Route Opening Hours                                                      |                           |        |
